potentialImpact: Highly exposed to US-China trade war; production in China faces potential tariff impacts, though some electronics exemptions may apply. (Source: Al Jazeera)
Affected by tariffs on imported materials (steel, aluminum) and potential retaliatory tariffs in key markets like China & EU. (Source: General news context)
Stock sensitive to US-China trade relations and tariffs/exemptions related to semiconductors. Rallied on signs of softer stance. (Source: Investopedia)
Highlighted potential negative impact on future results and margins due to tariffs on battery cell packs sourced from China. (Source: Investopedia)
Reported expected cost increases ($300M) due to tariffs, primarily US tariffs against China, impacting supply chain. (Source: AP News)
Reported expected cost impacts (up to $800M) from tariffs despite primarily US-based supply chain, citing disruption to duty-free environment. (Source: AP News)
Faces potential US tariffs on imported vehicles and impacted by EU countermeasures affecting US market access. (Source: General news context)
Luxury goods sector potentially targeted by retaliatory tariffs between US, EU, and China. (Source: General news context)
Broad exposure; potentially benefits from domestic manufacturing push spurred by some import tariffs, but impacted by input costs & overall trade climate. (Source: General news context)
Significant revenue from US exports; potentially impacted by US tariffs on auto components/truck parts. (Source: Angel One, India Today)
High revenue dependence on the US; vulnerable to trade policy shifts affecting outsourcing and visa costs. (Source: India Today)
Pharma sector was noted as being *exempted* from recent US reciprocal tariffs, providing relief despite high US revenue share. (Source: Angel One, India Today)
Withdrew financial guidance citing uncertainty caused by US tariffs obscuring ability to forecast US sales. (Source: Shares Magazine)
